title: Life in Mediterranean lands: California
brief_description: Explains the natural causes of a Mediterranean type of climate, using as an example the coastal strip of southern California. Shows how people there live and adapt themselves to the climate, and describes the plant and animal life of the area.
description: Explains the natural causes of a Mediterranean type of climate, using as an example the coastal strip of southern California. Shows how people there live and adapt themselves to the climate, and describes the plant and animal life of the area.
